message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.DS 

The paper deals with the problem of improving the security of distributed storage systems, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The use of interference alignment to improve the repair efficiency of failed nodes and to enhance data security suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-categories of networked systems (cs.NI), security and privacy (cs.SI), and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DS).
